name: Careless Canyon (N64 Style Platformer Prototype)
description:
Welcome to Careless Canyon!

This is a short 3d platforming prototype based on classic N64 games that I put together for working on my programming skills.

Use triple jumps and wall kicks, to guide your character around the perilous Careless Canyon to find 5 gold cubes and 50 gold coins!

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Left Stick

Camera: Arrow Keys / Right Stick

Jump: Space / A button / Cross button

Stats: TAB / Y button / Triangle button

Pause: Escape / Start Button / Options Button

(Note: Pause menu navigation currently doesn't support mouse but can still be navigated with WASD and Enter)

Tips:

- By jumping consecutively, you can jump even higher!

- Press in the direction of a wall while off of the ground, then press Jump to do a wall kick!

- After walking off of a platform you have a brief window where you can still jump!

-You can disable the N64 filter on the pause menu!

- He has cometh and awaits you where none would think to go.

Credits:

-Textures come from Super Mario 64

-Plai for his FPS wall running tutorial: Rigidbody FPS Controller Tutorial #1 | Basic Movement in less than 4 min - YouTube

Music:

You can hear the BGM on my soundcloud: Stream Careless Canyon by Kurt Plouf | Listen online for free on SoundCloud

Thank you for playing and please let me know if you have any technical difficulties or feedback!
